channel.title: Disposable Tanks – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: iJoy Mystique Mesh KIT
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Mystique Mod adopts 5 optional modes of: PMODE, POWER, POD, MTL and TEMP!
item.content:encoded:
What surprise can be produced when aesthetics meets innovation? The iJoy Mystique Mesh Kit will give you the answer, consisting of the Mystique Mod and Mystique Mesh Tank. The Mystique Mod adopts 5 optional modes of PMODE, POWER, POD, MTL and TEMP. It is compatible with dual 18650 batteries (not included) and can fire at wattage up to 162W with beastly power but a full safety suite of protection. The artwork by iJoy with the stylish streamlined design meet visionary creativity and palm-friendly size to seamlessly provide a harmonious touch and feel.

The Mystique Mesh Tank features a generous 3mL e-juice capacity with an easy top refill system without any leakage and adopts the food-grade plastic to bring you safe vaping experiences and the 0.15 ohm mesh coil resistance is optimized for best flavor with cloud production.

Specifications:

  • Max Wattage: 162W
  • Size: 130mm x 54mm x 27mm
  • Bright and big size screen
  • No overhang with 26mm tanks
  • Dual 18650 batteries Box Mod
  • Personalized design, with a unique experience
  • NI/TI/SS temperature control
  • TCR function
  • Unique Custom User Mode
  • Resistance Range: 0.05~3.0 ohm
  • Firmware Upgradeable

DUAL 18650 BATTERIES – Compatible with the tantamount power of dual 18650 batteries, the battery life of Mystique Mesh Kit lasts TWICE as long as competitive devices.

ERGONOMIC SIDE FIRE BUTTON – The ergonomic fire button is on the side, which is made of substantial stainless steel and emits strong fortitude.

FIVE OPTIONAL MODES – The innovation-oriented Mystique Mesh Kit adopts PMODE/POWER/POD/MTL and TEMP Mods for your selection, meeting your different vaping needs with outstanding performance, long-lasting battery, and all around protection.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x Mystique Mod
  • 1 x Mystique Mesh Tank
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User Manual
  • 1 x Warranty Card

item.title: DigiFlavor Helix Kit
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Three output modes available: BLUE: 3.4V, GREEN: Bypass, RED: 3.2V
item.content:encoded:
Helix from DigiFlavor is a stylish, single 18650 starter kit inspired by the form of double-helix. Built with high grade ultra-lightweight ABS material which increases impact and heat resistance. Three power output modes are available to match your personal preference.

The LUMI is a pre-coiled sub ohm tank that is powered with our supermesh coil system (non-replaceable) to produce the best flavor and outstanding vapor production. LUMI is built with food grade PC and stainless steel and only weighs 16g.

LUMI is a pre-coiled tank that uses the supermesh coil system to produce high grade flavor, holds 4mL of juice capacity that is conveniently refillable from the top port.

Three output modes available; BLUE: 3.4V, GREEN: Bypass, RED: 3.2V.

USB Pass-through allows you to simultaneously use the device while charging.

The advance AS chipset fires extremely fast and stable.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 x Helix
  • 1 x LUMI tank
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x User manual
  • Spare Parts Pack

item.title: VZone Preco 2 Disposable Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
Following on from the enormous success of the world’s first disposable plastic subohm tank, the Vzone Preco Tank and the Vzone Preco MTL Tank. Vlit is here introducing the next generation of the award winning Preco Tank, The Vzone PRECO2 MPOD!

The Preco2 MTL MPOD is specially designed to provide a modernized vaping experience with preco mesh coil technology alongside a plethora of ergonomic functionalities to complete the premier system. The Preco2 Mesh coils and organic cotton have been specifically paired up to the deliver a quality flavor some vape with every hit of your favorite E-liquid. Experience true, rich flavor like never before!

NOTE: Please be aware that this is NOT a stand alone tank. This product is a MTL Replacement Pod that is compatible with the Vlit Deck Tank. 

The Dpod & Mpod are DTL and MTL replacement pods.

FEATURES:

  • Size: 41*24mm
  • MTL Weight: 28g
  • Capacity : 3.5ml
  • Resistance: 0.5 Ohms
  • Recommended Wattage: 10-16W
  • Coil Material: Mesh
  • Coil Wicking Material: Organic Cotton

item.title: VZone Preco Disposable Tank
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
Vzone’s Preco Tank is a new revolutionary plastic design tank. It’s a non replaceable coil system (Just like CE4 Tanks, but the Preco Tank can subohm) with food grade polycarbonate material for insulation, and light weight construction. The unique all in one design produces excellent flavor and a surprisingly massive cloud! Vzone designed the tank to minimize the condensed liquid coming up through the chimney when vaping, making spit back virtually undetectable. This innovative tank can be the cost saving tank we have all been waiting for!

Tank Features:

  • Size: 40x24mm
  • Material : PC and Stainless Steel
  • Capacity: 3ml
  • Resistance: 0.15ohm
  • Rated Wattage: 40-70W (Best 50-60W)
  • Non replaceable MESH coil system
  • Food grade polycarbonate

Package Contents:

  • 1 x VZone Preco Tank

item.title: Innokin Gomax Disposable Tank .16 Ohm Mesh
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Innokin GoMax multi-use disposable tank has a massive 5.5ml E-Liquid capacity that delivers the most amazing flavors at a low price. The Innokin GoMax features an easy sliding top-fill and a silicone seal and the Plex3d Matrix coils to create massive clouds ready to stun the crowd and satisfy the crave. The Plex3D coil is able to handle 60-80W with ease and produce the best flavor you have ever tasted!

Tank Features:

  • Dimensions: 29*45.5mm
  • Tank Capacity: 5.5ml
  • Resistance and Wattage Range: 0.19ohms (60-80W)
  • Coil Material: Kanthal
  • Airflow: Adjustable
  • Top or Bottom Airflow?: Bottom
  • Wicking Material: Wood Pulp/Cotton
  • Top Fill?: Yes
  • Tank Materail: High Quality PCTG Plastic

Package Contents:

  • 1x Innokin GoMax Tank

item.title: iJoy Mystique Disposable Tank .15 Ohm Mesh
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Mystique Mesh Tank from iJoy features a generous 3mL e-juice capacity with an easy top refill system without any leakage and adopts the food-grade plastic to bring you safe vaping experiences and the 0.15 ohm mesh coil resistance is optimized for best flavor with cloud production.

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 24mm x 45mm
  • Capacity: 3.0mL
  • Resistance: 0.15 Ohms (40-70W)

OPTIMAL MESH COIL – The perfect combination of the mesh coil and the fiber cotton makes the heating even and absorb e-juice effectively, the 0.15 ohm coil resistance is optimized for the best flavor with cloud production.

ADJUSTABLE AIRFLOW – Fully adjustable dual airflow control gives you a completely customizable experience. You have the ability to choose the best airflow for your personal vape style and the wide dual airflow slots minimize leakage.

TOP FILL DESIGN WITH SILICONE STOPPER – Top-fill system makes filling as simple as it gets, the leaking annoyance can be effectively avoided with leak-proof design.

Contents:

1 x iJoy Mystique Mesh Disposable Tank

item.title: Blitz Mate Disposable Tank .15 Ohm Mesh
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Mate Disposable Tank is a flavor-focused sub-ohm tank that sits on a 24mm diameter and is integrated with a non-replaceable 0.15 ohm supermesh coil, making it the perfect disposable tank.

This innovative tank features a supermesh coil installed with wood pulp cotton and natural flax fiber, bringing superb flavor to a certain degree, extending the coil lifespan.

FEATURES:

  • Size: 24mm Diameter
  • Capacity: 4mL
  • Wattage Range: 40-60W (Best: 50-55W)
  • Integrated 0.15Ω Mesh Coil
  • Supermesh Coil System (non-replaceable)
  • High Precision Mould – No Leaking
